Force collection of Web Service request from B.C. Data Catalogue

Source: R/utils-classes.R, R/utils-collect.R
collect.Rd

After tuning a query, collect() is used to actually bring the data into memory. This will retrieve an sf object into R.

See dplyr::collect for details.

# S3 method for bcdc_promise
collect(x, ...)

Arguments

x

object of class bcdc_promise

Methods (by class)

  • bcdc_promise: collect.bcdc_promise

Examples

# \donttest{
bcdc_query_geodata("bc-airports") %>%
  collect()
#> Simple feature collection with 455 features and 41 fields
